vclaim: In March 2021, U.S. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene posed by an unauthorized "Fort Pelosi" sign on a security fence outside of the U.S. Capitol.
title: Did Marjorie Taylor Greene Pose by ‘Fort Pelosi’ Sign Outside US Capitol?
subtitle: The congresswoman was criticized for posting the picture after a driver crashed through a fence surrounding the Capitol in April 2021 and killed a police officer.
author: Bethania Palma
